column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This place is incredible. My husband and I can't stop talking about it. We both love pizza and were both excited and nervous to try Chicago-style deep dish. Our friend took us here
column2: and we loved it. We shared a big salad and the three-cheese bread for appetizers
column3: and both were incredible. I had a personal deep dish with onions
column5: and the fresh spinach mix and my husband had the Malnati Chicago Classic. So good!! Word of warning - there is quite a wait but you can order your pizza ahead of time so it's ready when you get your table. It was also very hot in the dining room in the back
